original_title: The Pied Piper of Basin Street
overview: The Pied Piper of Basin Street  Release Date: 1/15/45  Direction: James Culhane  Story: Ben Hardaway and Milt Schaffer  Animation Layout: Art Heinemann  Animation: Verne Harding and Pat Matthews  Music: Darrell Calker  Backgrounds: Philip DeGuard  Featuring: Jack Teagarden  Notes:  Production Number: D-10  A Swing Symphony cartoon. The Pied Piper is a caricature of Jimmy Durante, while the mayor is a caricature of Lou Costello.  Michael Fitzgerald incorrectly lists this cartoon as a November 1944 release.
title: The Pied Piper of Basin Street
